title: How to Find Low Competition Niches for Amazon KDP Self Publishing (Step-By-Step)
description:
Learn the exact 3-step system Karla uses to find low-competition, high-demand KDP niches most publishers miss. This video shows you how to evaluate BSR properly, avoid costly mistakes, and spot profitable tropes and trends that are working right now.
